rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A small foyer designed to channel positive energy as per Vastu. The entrance is oriented towards the east for auspicious entry, ensuring calm first impressions.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with Mediterranean accents such as stucco walls and terracotta tiles. Large windows on the east and north sides allow natural light while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An open dining space adjoining the living area, featuring built-in seating and an island counter. The placement encourages family gatherings in a harmonious environment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen designed with energy-efficient features and Mediterranean design elements such as marble countertops. The layout ensures smooth workflow, following Vastu principles by placing the stove in the south-eastern corner.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A small guest bathroom located near the main entrance, designed for easy access. Windows are oriented to provide ample natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open courtyard acting as the heart of the ground floor. This area is designed with Mediterranean landscaping and water features to promote serenity, following Vastuâ€™s emphasis on natural elements.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility space for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance tools. Located conveniently near the kitchen, ensuring efficient household management.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned on the southern side to maintain a balanced energy flow as per Vastu guidelines. It features traditional Mediterranean door design with modern security systems.
Large windows installed in living and dining areas to maximize natural light, ensure proper ventilation, and maintain privacy according to local building norms.
A small balcony on the west side provides outdoor space while ensuring that direct sunlight is moderated during peak hours in line with Vastu principles for cooling.
Well-coordinated internal door placements to facilitate easy movement and maintain a seamless flow between spaces, adhering to local architectural norms.
